tool_description: Collects real-time measurements from grid sensors including voltage, current, power, and frequency data from specified monitoring points.

sensor_ids.description: List of sensor identifiers to collect data from

measurement_types.description: Types of measurements to collect: voltage, current, power, frequency, temperature

sampling_rate.description: Data sampling rate in Hz (0.1 to 10000)

error_messages: Invalid sensor ID: One or more sensor IDs are not recognized in the grid network.
Unsupported measurement type: Use one of [voltage, current, power, frequency, temperature].
Sampling rate out of range: Must be between 0.1 and 10000 Hz.
Duration out of range: Must be between 1 and 1440 minutes.
Sensor communication error: Unable to establish connection with specified sensors.
usage: Specify sensor_ids and measurement_types as required parameters, with optional sampling_rate and required duration_minutes. Returns timestamped measurement data for analysis.

timestamps.description: Array of ISO 8601 timestamp strings for each measurement

sensor_data.description: Array of measurement values corresponding to timestamps
